channel.title: 508+ Client help!
channel.description:
Hi guys! Evereytime i load a 508 client he keeps loading with the tekst: on the cmd: error_game_js5connect and on the client it keeps loading with : connecting to update server. Screens: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/hwe51e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2wrl253.jpg[/img]
But if i run the Davidscape CLOSED client it runs! And it works..
On all my computers @ home it doesnt work on my friends computers it works fine I dont know why it wont on mine.
Yes i have installed all cache's on the right place. and yes the server is running...
So if you have a idea please help!!!!
Or can i edit the davidscape client to mine ip.
Thank yaaa Emile

item.title: 508+ Client help!
item.dc:creator: @wallfire wallfire
item.description:
@wallfire wrote:

1)server is offline
2)entered wrong ip
3)no background on client

they are the possible reason why it isnt working!

Read full topic

item.title: 508+ Client help!
item.dc:creator: @iwillpureyou iwillpureyou
item.description:
@iwillpureyou wrote:

Make sure you’ve entered the right IP.

Read full topic

item.title: 508+ Client help!
item.dc:creator: @Royalclubz Royalclubz
item.description:
@Royalclubz wrote:

Hi guys!
Evereytime i load a 508 client
he keeps loading with the tekst:
on the cmd: error_game_js5connect
and on the client it keeps loading with : connecting to update server.
Screens:

hwe51e.jpg1599×807

2wrl253.jpg1599×807

But if i run the Davidscape CLOSED client it runs!
And it works…

On all my computers @ home it doesnt work
on my friends computers it works fine
I dont know why it wont on mine.

Yes i have installed all cache’s on the right place.
and yes the server is running…

So if you have a idea please help!!!

Or can i edit the davidscape client to mine ip.

Thank yaaa
Emile

Read full topic
